alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 7:26PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atascosa and southwestern Wilson Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Campbellton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Campbellton, Coughran, McCoy and Fashing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
